00034     CR_IDLE_THREAD_ID           = 0,                    
00035     CR_REGISTER_THREAD_ID       = CR_IDLE_THREAD_ID,    
00036     CR_SYSTEM_STARTED           = -1,                   
00037     CR_INVALID_ID               = -1

00053 typedef struct CR_CONTEXT {
00054     void        (*pFunc)(void);
00055     jmp_buf     env;
00056     cr_id_t     id;
00057 } CR_CONTEXT;

00072 #define CR_THREAD_INIT()                                                \
00073             static cr_id_t this_id__;                                   \
00074             this_id__ = cr_g_current_cr_id;                             \
00075             cr_g_previous_cr_id = this_id__;                            \
00076             cr_g_current_cr_id = CR_REGISTER_THREAD_ID;                 \
00077             if(!setjmp(cr_g_context[this_id__].env))                    \
00078                 longjmp(cr_g_context[CR_REGISTER_THREAD_ID].env, 1)
00079 
00089 #define CR_START(func_name)                                                                         \
00090             cr_idle();                                                                              \
00091             cr_g_previous_cr_id = CR_INVALID_ID;                                                    \
00092             cr_g_current_cr_id = cr_get_id(func_name);                                              \
00093             assert((cr_g_current_cr_id != CR_INVALID_ID) && "CR_START:  CR_INVALID_ID!\n");         \
00094             assert((cr_g_current_cr_id <= cr_g_context_cnt) && "CR_START: ID out of bounds!\n");    \
00095             cr_g_sys_started = CR_SYSTEM_STARTED;                                                   \
00096             longjmp(cr_g_context[cr_g_current_cr_id].env, 1)
00097 
00106 #define CR_YIELD(func_name)                                                                         \
00107             cr_g_current_cr_id = cr_get_id(func_name);                                              \
00108             assert((cr_g_current_cr_id != CR_INVALID_ID) && "CR_YIELD: CR_INVALID_ID!\n");          \
00109             assert((cr_g_current_cr_id <= cr_g_context_cnt) && "CR_YIELD: ID out of bounds!\n");    \
00110             assert((cr_g_current_cr_id != this_id__) && "CR_YIELD: recursive coroutine call!\n");   \
00111             cr_g_previous_cr_id = this_id__;                                                        \
00112             if(!setjmp(cr_g_context[this_id__].env))                                                \
00113                 longjmp(cr_g_context[cr_g_current_cr_id].env, 1)

00120     extern CR_CONTEXT*  cr_g_context;
00121     extern uint32_t     cr_g_context_cnt;
